scripts.rmdir: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); process.argv.slice(1).map((fpath) => fs.rmdirSync(fpath, { recursive: true })); process.exit(0);"
scripts.prebuild: echo "Removing Directory" && npm run rmdir -- www/js www/css www/img
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build--css
scripts.clean-www: echo "Removing WWW Files" && npm run rmdir -- www/js www/css www/img
scripts.electron-setup: npm init && npm i && npm i electron
scripts.dev-run: start npm run check-imgs && start esbuild dev/js/index.js --bundle --outfile=www/js/index.js --sourcemap --bundle --watch
scripts.git-init: git init && git add . && git remote add origin https://github.com/tmg-js-modules/example-project.git && git branch -M main
scripts.git-push: git add . && git commit -m "Update Example-Template Project" && git push -u origin main
